information: We are growers, farmers, entrepreneurs, basically we are people setting out on a new adventure as a way to keep us together in the place we are from.The success of our venture is founded on research, we use innovative processes, experiment with new watering approaches and use the latest technologies to preserve our truffles: our packing system is unlike anything else around here and it helps preserve the truffles flavours for longer.
